parameters.name: voucher_id
parameters.description: The base for id system, using a stable code generated in the api. Will be valid for voucher list.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shopping center identifier for a shop. Required parts for the api

response_fields.name: error
response_fields.description: Indicates error type if true error. Empty if no error happened

response_fields.name: message
response_fields.description: Indicates error details if any error. Empty if no error

response_fields.name: success
response_fields.description: Standard response code of success true or false

response_fields.name: partner_id
response_fields.description: The unique identifier for the voucher it is being queried
